name: Modify Field in Selling Setting
script:
frappe.db.set_value(
    "DocField", 
    {"parent": "Selling Settings", "fieldname": "maintain_same_rate_action"}, 
    "depends_on",
    "eval: (doc.validate_selling_price || doc.maintain_same_sales_rate)"
)

frappe.db.set_value(
    "DocField", 
    {"parent": "Selling Settings", "fieldname": "role_to_override_stop_action"}, 
    "depends_on",
    "eval: ((doc.validate_selling_price || doc.maintain_same_sales_rate) && doc.maintain_same_rate_action == 'Stop')"
)
frappe.db.commit()
